results.name: Number of bargraphs of site-perimeter n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
M. Bousquet-Mélou and A. Rechnitzer, The site-perimeter of bargraphs, Adv. in Appl. Math. 31 (2003), 86-112.
formula: The generating function is known in closed form. Closed, but complicated. It is proved to be non-D-finite.
maple: b:= proc(n, y, t, w) option remember; `if`(n<0, 0, `if`(n=0, (1-t),
results.author: Andrew Rechnitzer (a.rechnitzer(AT)ms.unimelb.edu.au), Sep 09 2002
ext: Offset corrected by _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 04 2016
